video.title: El marginal
video.synopsis: While investigating a kidnapping, an ex-cop sent to infiltrate a prison finds himself surrounded by dangerous felons who can't know his real identity.

episodes.synopsis: Jailed ex-policeman Miguel Palacios is tasked with infiltrating a Buenos Aires prison to help a judge find out who kidnapped his daughter.
episodes.title: Chapter 1

episodes.synopsis: Pastor Pe√±a continues to develop his plan to get closer to the Borges brothers. Meanwhile, his own brother brings him unexpected news.
episodes.title: Chapter 2

episodes.synopsis: Pastor struggles to make contact with Luna. Emma is threatened when she tries to tell the truth about Diosito. Fernando confronts Lunati.
episodes.title: Chapter 3

episodes.synopsis: Diosito starts to get suspicious of Pastor and his intentions. An inmate's depression worsens. Lunati demands he get his daughter back.
episodes.title: Chapter 4

episodes.synopsis: Luna's transfer from the prison becomes an increasingly dangerous endeavor. Lunati follows through on his threat. Pastor comforts Emma after a loss.
episodes.title: Chapter 5

episodes.synopsis: Pastor learns troubling news about his family. The attorney general begins an investigation into recent incidents in the prison.
episodes.title: Chapter 6

episodes.synopsis: A flashback reveals more about Pastor's past life as Miguel. In the present, Pastor is consumed by the need to find his missing son.
episodes.title: Chapter 7

episodes.synopsis: Ant√≠n makes good on his promise, but adds a few conditions. Emma's assistance in Pastor's search for his son leads her to a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Chapter 8

episodes.synopsis: Vengeful behavior runs rampant in the San Onofre prison and the stakes couldn't get any higher. Ant√≠n worries he has lost control of his inmates.
episodes.title: Chapter 9

episodes.synopsis: Emma checks in on Pastor's mother. The feud between the Borges brothers and Sub 21 continues while Ant√≠n worries his lies will catch up to him.
episodes.title: Chapter 10

episodes.synopsis: Gast√≥n raises the pressure on the warden. Emma finds a lead while looking for Pastor's son. Borges plots his revenge on Sub 21.
episodes.title: Chapter 11

episodes.synopsis: A prisoner remembers Pastor from his days as a police officer. Gast√≥n is intrigued by rumors about Pastor and Emma's romantic relationship.
episodes.title: Chapter 12

episodes.synopsis: Pastor continues to plan his escape but Emma is concerned he is putting himself at risk. More people learn about Pastor's real identity.
episodes.title: Chapter 13

episodes.synopsis: Three years before the fire, Borges escapes one prison only to end up in another alongside his brother Diosito. Emma starts her first day of work.
episodes.title: Chapter 1

episodes.synopsis: A call from the prison demanding ransom for a fake kidnapping ends fatally. A threatened Patricio meets with El Sapo. The warden offers Borges a deal.
episodes.title: Chapter 2

episodes.synopsis: The guards search for a missing Ontiveros. Borges, Diosito and Patricio try to cover up a crime. El Sapo celebrates his daughter's 15th birthday.
episodes.title: Chapter 3

episodes.synopsis: Borges and his men worry that El Sapo will retaliate because of the call center attack. The police investigate San Onofre.
episodes.title: Chapter 4

episodes.synopsis: Borges and El Sapo confront each other as tensions rise among their groups and Cuis gets involved. Emma discovers more about the prostitution ring.
episodes.title: Chapter 5

episodes.synopsis: Camila confesses the truth about her husband's murder, but Patricio remains in trouble. While El Sapo is gone, Morcilla and Borges consider a ceasefire.
episodes.title: Chapter 6

episodes.synopsis: Emma reports the prostitution ring to Gar√≥falo, who takes action. Diosito receives a disturbing letter. A riot begins in the prison.
episodes.title: Chapter 7

episodes.synopsis: Diosito helps save Patricio. Rita's life is in danger, along with many others', as the riot intensifies and leaves multiple victims wounded and dead.
episodes.title: Chapter 8

episodes.synopsis: Mario cuts two deals: one to look out for a young privileged newbie in exchange for freedom for himself and Diosito, and the other with a vicious narco.
episodes.title: Chapter 1

episodes.synopsis: Mario assigns Diosito to take care of the newbie, Moco, but Diosito decides to give him a crash course in criminality. Emma suffers post-riot trauma.
episodes.title: Chapter 2

episodes.synopsis: Mario falls behind on his narco debt and forces his prison chemist into new heights of creativity. Meanwhile, Moco gets high to drown his troubles.
episodes.title: Chapter 3

episodes.synopsis: The new business is going well but Diosito is devastated when he learns Mario's been keeping information from him. Moco realizes he's in danger.
episodes.title: Chapter 4

episodes.synopsis: Pantera, Mario's personal prisoner, is released by a rival faction and wreaks havoc on the Borges' enterprises. Emma falls deeper into addiction.
episodes.title: Chapter 5

episodes.synopsis: Mario has a catastrophic business setback. Diosito, who survives a near fatal beating, brutally confronts him. Moco realizes he's on the wrong side.
episodes.title: Chapter 6

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Diosito continue to argue while Moco, now without protection, makes a decision. After a prison crackdown, Bruni masterminds a takeover.
episodes.title: Chapter 7

episodes.synopsis: Bruni uses Pantera as his personal attack dog against the Borges while the chemist, Tubito, stalks Emma. Rival prison authorities fight for control.
episodes.title: Chapter 8
